name: webdav-backup
description: A simple, fast, and efficient tool for backing up files to a WebDAV server

scripts.build:
bun build index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun --minify --external chalk --external webdav --naming webdav-backup.js --banner "#!/usr/bin/env bun
/**
 * webdav-backup v$npm_package_version
 * A simple, fast CLI for backing up files to WebDAV servers
 * https://github.com/ngarate/webdav-backup
 */"

author: ngarate
